name: Sweet Bread Pudding
keywords: bread, half and half, maple syrup, fall, side dish, vegetarian
recipeIngredient: 6 cups white bread, cut or torn into 1-inch chunks

recipeInstructions.text: Butter an 8-inch souffle or baking dish, and add bread. Cut remaining butter into bits, and combine with all other ingredients; pour over bread. Submerge bread with weighted plate, and turn oven to 350 degrees.
When oven is hot, remove the plate and bake until pudding is just set, 35 to 45 minutes. Serve with or without whipped cream.
